pageContext.claim: “Nearly 85 percent of jurisdictions all across our country are reporting a very steep decline in cases.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is playing down the spread of the coronavirus by noting declines in new cases in some states (where he needs a victory in the Electoral College to win reelection), but nationwide, the United States has had three peaks of new coronavirus cases as of October because political leaders have failed to flatten the curve, as other countries did successfully.
